Introduction

Kang Taehyun is a South Korean singer-songwriter, dancer, and composer under Big Hit Entertainment. He is best known as a member of the boy group TXT.

On January 17, 2019, Taehyun was revealed as the fourth member of TXT. The group officially debuted on March 4, 2019 with their debut mini album "The Dream Chapter: STAR".

Fun facts

1
Taehyun used to make educational videos teaching kids how to speak English when he was younger. He and his sister can both speak English.
…
2
Taehyun is good at swimming and boxing.
…
3
Taehyun considers SHINee's Taemin and BTS' Jungkook as his role models.
…
4
Taehyun has a cat named Hobak and a mini-sized snake named Aengdu (Cherry in English).
…
5
According to Taehyun, he is the right-hand man of Soobin.
…
6
Taehyun once wanted to be a Magician.
…
7
Taehyun dreamed of becoming a performer after seeing SHINee's Taemin's dance break in the song "Replay".
…
8
Taehyun speaks a little Japanese.
…
9
Taehyun sleeps with his eyes open. Sometimes, Soobin checks if he’s really asleep.
…

Taehyun's favorite girl group is TWICE.
